name: Confrontation
description:
It's a piece by Mr M.Reza Namavar as member of Sepas art group, he painted this piece by plaster and pastels on canvas in expressionism style.

Afghan women and all the other middle eastern women always under pressure by patriarchal society underety in the other hand in west and modern east country women trying to find right position in civil society ,he wants to show differences between these cultures ,he has painted the western eye between Borgha from traditional outfit to show the conflict two society , this painting has two bold colors red and black , red symbol of defiance from Iranian women ,so black color it means dark condition inside that country like ours.

It's for Afghan girls, wishing them freedom.
